constraint.description: API classes must not have dependencies on implementation classes.
constraint.cypher: MATCH p=shortestPath((a:CLASS)-[:CONTAINS|DEPENDS_ON*]->(i:CLASS)) WHERE a:API AND i:IMPL RETURN extract(c in nodes(p) : c.FQN) as Path ORDER BY length(p) DESC

constraint.description: All JPA entities must be located in the package "persistence.api"
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS]->(e) WHERE e:JPA AND e:ENTITY AND NOT(p.FQN =~ {packageExpression}) RETURN e.FQN as className

constraint.description: All EJBs must be located in the package logic.impl or sub-packages.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS]->(b) WHERE b:EJB AND NOT(p.FQN =~ {packageExpression}) RETURN b.FQN as className

constraint.description: The name of all test classes must have the suffix "Test".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (c:CLASS) WHERE c:TEST and NOT(c.FQN =~ {suffixExpression}) RETURN c.FQN as className
